title: Update on Ticket Minimums
content:
Hello, friends!

Popping by on Thanksgiving Eve to confirm that the holiday party will stay as scheduled on Monday, December 2, at 7pm.

Because it's cool to be meta, we'll be gathering at B Flat Bar.

B Flat Bar in Tribeca for food, debauchery, and libations!

Bring your spouses, paramours, partners, and friends—all are welcome!

DRESS CODE: HOLIDAZZLE
